weekly picks (Dec 4 week 2021)

Posted on December 20, 2021 in 2021dec 

A WordCloud of 2021 Dec 4th week collection

  1. http://arxiv.org/abs/2112.10760 Magic-Angle Multilayer Graphene: A Robust Family of Moir\‘e Superconductors (arXiv.org)

  2. http://arxiv.org/abs/2112.10758 On the nature of valence charge and spin excitations via multi-orbital Hubbard models for infinite-layer nickelates (nickelate, arXiv.org)

  3. http://arxiv.org/abs/2112.09735 Systematic electronic structure in the cuprate parent state from quantum many-body simulations (arXiv.org)

  4. http://arxiv.org/abs/2112.10397 Failure of the mean-field description of magnetic fluctuations in the superconducting quantum dot (arXiv.org)

  5. http://arxiv.org/abs/2112.10188 Formation of bound states and BCS-BEC crossover near a flat band: the sawtooth lattice (arXiv.org)

  6. http://arxiv.org/abs/2112.10336 Topological chiral and nematic superconductivity by doping Mott insulators on triangular lattice (triangular lattice, arXiv.org)

  7. http://arxiv.org/abs/2112.10215 Heisenberg spins on an anisotropic triangular lattice: PdCrO2 under uniaxial stress (arXiv.org)

  8. http://arxiv.org/abs/2112.10076 The origin of insulating and non-ferromagnetic SrRuO3 monolayers (monolayer ruthenate, arXiv.org)

  9. http://arxiv.org/abs/2112.09749 Superconducting proximity effect in $d$-wave cuprate/ graphene heterostructures (arXiv.org)

  10. http://arxiv.org/abs/2112.10763 Snapshot-based detection of $\frac{1}{2}$-Laughlin states: coupled chains and central charge (arXiv.org)

  11. http://arxiv.org/abs/2112.10240 Visualization of Topological Boundary Modes Manifesting Topological Nodal-Point Superconductivity (arXiv.org)

  12. http://arxiv.org/abs/2112.10045 p-wave superconductivity in Luttinger semimetals (arXiv.org)

  13. http://arxiv.org/abs/2112.10036 Pressure-induced charge orders and their coupling to magnetism in hexagonal multiferroic LuFe2O4 (arXiv.org)

  14. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.104.214425 Strain-induced phase diagram of the $S=\frac{3}{2}$ Kitaev material ${\mathrm{CrSiTe}}_{3}$ (kitaev, PRB)

  15. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.104.235135 Magnetization dynamics fingerprints of an excitonic condensate ${t}_{2g}^{4}$ magnet (PRB)

  16. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.104.235136 Tunable topological phase transition from nodal-line semimetal to Weyl semimetal by breaking symmetry (PRB)

  17. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.104.235138 Counterexample to the conjectured Planckian bound on transport (PRB)

  18. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.104.245421 Theoretical study of stability, epitaxial formation, and phase transformations of two-dimensional pnictogen allotropes (PRB)

  19. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.104.224425 Spin dynamics in the skyrmion-host lacunar spinel ${\mathrm{GaV}}{4}{\mathrm{S}}{8}$ (skyrmion, PRB)

  20. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.104.235134 Magnetic correlation between two local spins in a quantum spin Hall insulator (PRB)

  21. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.104.235137 Coupling to zone-center optical phonons in $\mathrm{V}{\mathrm{Se}}_{2}$ enhanced by charge density waves (PRB)

  22. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.104.235425 Quasiparticle interference patterns in bilayer graphene with trigonal warping (trigonal warping, PRB)

  23. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.104.245130 One-dimensional lattice models for the boundary of two-dimensional Majorana fermion symmetry-protected topological phases: Kramers-Wannier duality as an exact ${Z}_{2}$ symmetry (PRB)

  24. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.104.245419 Edge state in AB-stacked bilayer graphene and its correspondence with the Su-Schrieffer-Heeger ladder (SSH, PRB)

  25. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.104.L220506 Theory of superconductivity due to Ngai’s mechanism in lightly doped ${\mathrm{SrTiO}}_{3}$ (PRB)

  26. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.104.L241107 Existence of corner modes in elastic twisted kagome lattices (kagome, PRB)

  27. https://arxiv.org/abs/2112.09270v1 Ascendance of Superconductivity in Magic-Angle Graphene Multilayers (arxiv.org)

  28. https://arxiv.org/abs/2112.09187v1 Thermal Hall conductivity of electron-doped cuprates (Taillefer, arxiv.org)

  29. https://arxiv.org/abs/2112.09149v1 Quenched randomness, thermal fluctuations and reentrant superconductivity: application to UTe$_2$ (SRague, arxiv.org)

  30. https://arxiv.org/abs/2112.09144v1 Does elastically deformed monolayer graphene have a curved space Dirac description? (Curved Dirac, arxiv.org)
